sub_title: Director at Trois Geoconsulting, Business Development Consultant at Xcalibur Multiphysics
summary:
Experience in Business Development, Management and Consulting  in resource exploration (Minerals, Oil&Gas and Geothermal). Interested in being part of a global group applying technological innovation to resource exploration.

Specialties: Business Development, Geophysics, Potential Field Methods, Remote Sensing, GIS, Data Processing, Interpretation, Quality Control, Data Management.
